SubtitleTexts.Text: 0001. Weird. I don't remember lying down yet.
0002. Where did I leave my pills?
0003. I really should take my pills, right now.
0005. My mind was really messed up.
0006. I thought I had more pills.
0007. How many did I take last night?
0009. It didn't feel like a dream.
0011. Well, I need to get some sleep.
0012. I really should get some sleep now.
0017. Does this really have nine thousand games in one?
0020. Why would I light a candle now?
0021. I could play this all day long.
0025. I won't let them find you.
0027. SANTA: You should've stayed in bed, kid.
0029. SANTA: Don't you dare touch Santa Claus.
0031. I should get rid of this already.
0032. I'd rather not waste my last candle.
0035. I need someone to play with.
0036. I'm really tired of these meaningless reports.
0038. Why did I lock my bedroom?
0039. I didn't do anything to her! I found her like this. You have to believe me!
0040. I can't sleep when I'm hungry.
0041. I didn't pay the cable TV bill.
0044. Come on, Emily, don't leave me like this. Breathe, damn it, just breathe!
0045. OUTSIDE: Police! We have a warrant! Open the door or we'll be forced to break in!
0046. I need a gift for her.
0047. This is yours, Emily. I love you, and I miss you.
0048. I didn't pay the phone bill.
0049. I didn't pay the damn phone bill!
0050. I need to pay these bills.
0051. I'd rather use the smaller milk carton.
0052. Practicing is a struggle for me now.
0060. I don't need a spoon right now.
0061. I don't remember how this is called.
0069. There is an odd shine on this pot.
0070. There's a peculiar shine on this pot.
0071. It haunts me in my dreams.
0076. I don't want to read right now.
